title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the 'Open' and 'Close' options for the projects are not always available in the Navigator.
EB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, either both 'Open' and 'Close' options should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects named P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Attempt to close project P2 and observe the behavior in the Navigator.
